ygData.subject: Re: newbie questions
ygData.msgSnippet: One thing more thing that as a Dark Elf enchanter that I just found out. If you change to a form in your home city that your guards don t like then you ARE KOS
ygData.messageBody:
One thing more thing that as a Dark Elf enchanter that I just found out. If
you change to a form in your home city that your guards don't like then you
ARE KOS on site. Found this out the very hard way. Got my newbie level 4
illusions, Human and Half-elf. Human just conned me at dubious. Half-elf
and I was dead in two swipes. Ouch.

Crystallyn
Dark Elf Enchantress Mith Marr


----- Original Message -----
From: Garett <osmosis@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, February 16, 2000 6:18 PM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] newbie questions



>
> > 4) At what level can I go into the evil cities? My gnome necro can go
> > into Neriak - can my agnostic enchanter go there in gnome form? Can I
go
> > into Grobb or Oggok in dark elf form, or must I wait for ogre/troll
form?
>
> As soon as you get illusion - dark elf you can go everywhere in Norrath
> (except watch that shadowknight guild). As an agnostic you arent limited
by
> religion.
>
